title: Understanding Embeddings Through Epic Fantasy
abstract: A journey through the world of embeddings, illustrated with epic fantasy literature and interactive visualizations. Learn how embeddings transform text into numerical vectors that capture meaning and relationships, using examples from The Wheel of Time, Mistborn, and other fantasy series.

title: Vistrates: A Versatile Tool for Data Analytics in the World of On-Device Intelligence
abstract: Introducing a platform for many activities in data exploration between multiple users on heterogeneous devices. Vistrates is web-based and collaborative by nature, thus supporting data analysis anywhere, anytime, and by anyone.

title: Elastic Documents: Reading Data-Rich Documents with Generated Visualizations
abstract: Linking text and tables through contextual visualizations in data-rich documents improves reading comprehension. Our user evaluations have shown the power of this new approach in summarization and comprehension of data-rich documents.
name: elasticdocs

title: TimeFork: Exploring Multiple Futures in the Stock Market with Generative Models
abstract: A new tool called TimeFork uses interactive graphics and state-of-the-art statistical models to allow traders to investigate multiple parallel universes for predicting the stock market.
